page.title: 10HEALTH
page.content: {PERSONAL, HOSPITALS, SOCIAL. { {PERSONAL :}INDIVIDUALS ARE KEEN ON KEEPING FIT AND SPORTS SUCH AS JOGGING, AEROBICS, ATHLETICS ETC ARE POPULAR FOR THIS PURPOSE. SMOKING IS NOT ENCOURAGED BUT DENTAL CARE IS AS CHILDREN'S TEETH ARE NOW LESS HEALTHY THAN EVER BEFORE. {HOSPITALS :}THERE IS ONLY ONE HOSPITAL IN OUR AREA WHICH CARES FOR THE DISABLED AND ELDERLY. THE NEAREST MAIN HOSPITALS ARE CAMERON(WINDYGATES) AND VICTORIA(KIRKCALDY),BOTH OF WHICH ARE APPROXIMATELY 11 KM AWAY FROM OUR AREA. LOCAL HEALTH CENTRES CAN HANDLE MINOR CASUALTIES,ETC. {SOCIAL :}SOCIAL WORK DEPARTMENTS CARE FOR THE DISABLED, THE UNEMPLOYED, THE ELDERLY AND ONE PARENT FAMILIES.
